department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Contract Title
School Bus with Driver

##### Reference Number
WS4035589632-Doc4053582703

#### Public Notice # 
1

#### Solicitation # 
WS4035589632

#### Publication Date 
June 16, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date 
July 19, 2023 at 14:00

#### Expected Contract Start Date 
July 20, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date 
July 20, 2026

#### Tender Status 
Expired

#### Procurement Category 
Services (SRV)

#### Notice Type 
Request for Standing Offer

#### Procurement Method 
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Trade Agreements 
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End-User Entity 
Departement of National Defence (DND)
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contract Details
A Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is being sought for the provision of all labor, transportation, materials, tools, equipment, and supervision necessary to provide School Buses with Drivers, with operators on an "as and when required" basis. The contract is expected to start on July 20, 2023 and end on July 20, 2026.

#### Important Information
* Notice of solicitation will be provided at the website link provided below.
* Entities must register with the contracting department to participate in the open bidding.

#### Contact Information
Lee, Oana (elle-la / she-her)
oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### End-User Entity and Contracting Entity
For a complete list of services and contact information, please visit: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16610419?extsite=MTY2MTA0MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Let me know if there's anything else you need. 

Best regards,
